verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are my strength
When I am weak
You are the treasure
That I seek
You are my All in All
Seeking You as a precious jew'l
Lord to give up I'd be a fool
You are my All in All

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
You are my strength
When I am weak
You are the treasure
That I seek
You are my All in All

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
Seeking You as a precious jew'l
Lord to give up I'd be a fool
You are my All in All

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Taking my sin
My cross my shame
Rising again I bless Your name
You are my All in All
Sisters:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Brothers:
When I fall down You pick me up
When I am dry You fill my cup
You are my All in All
Sisters:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
Taking my sin
My cross my shame
Rising again I bless Your name
You are my All in All

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Brothers:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Sisters:
When I fall down You pick me up
When I am dry You fill my cup
You are my All in All

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Together:
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your name
